= An Introduction to GRAF =

== Models ==

=== Elevator ===

This model uses State Machine Regions

http://graf-framework.googlecode.com/files/Elevator.png

=== If Test ===

This model was used to test the teams implementation of if statements within GRAF

=== Microwave with Integer ===

This model was intially added to GRAF by the 2009 project team

http://graf-framework.googlecode.com/files/microwave.jpg


=== Microwave Timer ===

Uses a slightly modified version of the Microwave with Integer model to include the function of a timer. The Integer part of the original model is removed in this model.

The timer function is based on the 2010 teams implementation at this stage.
